scenes.description: A collection of fan-submitted supportive messages for hololive English members, shown on screen before the concert.
Promotion for hololive plushies from FuRyu, available at Round 1 in the US.
Promotion for the hololive x Round 1 campaign starting in October 2024.
Announcement trailer and PV for 'ENigmatic Recollection', including launch party details.
Advertisement for hololive English 2nd Concert merch and the holoplus+ app.
Pre-concert announcement and visitor safety guidelines.
Showcase of various concert-exclusive merchandise items.
Continuation of fan messages displayed for the audience.

subtitles.original:
フワモコちゃんへ
デビューしてから追い続けてるよ！

I've been following you since your debut!
